title: Moments from 2024
description: A collection of miscellaneous photographs capturing diverse moments and scenes from 2024.

images.description: A Boeing 737 airplane gracefully descending towards the runway.
Light trails created by cars on a busy road at night, captured with a long exposure.
A majestic clock tower standing tall against a clear sky.
A vast green field stretching towards the horizon.
A vibrant display of fireworks illuminating the night sky.
A breathtaking night sky filled with countless stars.
A picturesque sunset over a winding country road.
A portrait of my friend, Joe, in the picturesque Penygader Valley.
A shot of my friend, Owen, from behind with the iconic Durdle Door framing the scene.
A portrait of my friend, Mini, with the majestic Penygader Mountain as the backdrop.
